import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import "./SASS/style.css"; import { faThumbsUp, faTimes } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; const TodoItems = (props)=>{ const active = (e)=>{ e.style.display = "none" console.log(e); } return(
active(Math.random)} className = 'thumbs-up-icon icon' icon = {faThumbsUp} >

Task: { props.task }

props.removing(props.id)} icon = { faTimes } className = 'closeIcon'>
active(Math.random)} className = 'thumbs-up-icon icon' icon = {faThumbsUp} >

Task: { props.task }

props.removing(props.id)} icon = { faTimes } className = 'closeIcon'>
active(Math.random)} className = 'thumbs-up-icon icon' icon = {faThumbsUp} >

props.removing(props.id)} icon = { faTimes } className = 'closeIcon'>
) } export default TodoItems
